ui

Class IconFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.IconFactory

  • public class IconFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A Tile's or tool"s icon name is based on its class name and it's surroundings.
    Author:
    Martine Gautier, Victorien Elvinger

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEBRIS_TILE_ID

      Default 'no-icon' for tool.
      private java.lang.String pathTemplate 
      static java.lang.String SAME_EAST_POSTID
      Id if the tile east of the chosen tile is of the same instance or meant to connect in a specific way to it

      Id if the tile up-north of the chosen tile is of the same instance or meant to connect in a specific way to it
      static java.lang.String SAME_SOUTH_POSTID
      Id if the tile down-south of the chosen tile is of the same instance or meant to connect in a specific way to it
      static java.lang.String SAME_WEST_POSTID
      Id if the tile west of the chosen tile is of the same instance or meant to connect in a specific way to it
